`{{mainCategories|reject('equalto', 'one-of-my-category')}}`

Hello, everyone. Do you know why the code above doesnt work ? How can i filter ? :slightly_smiling_face:

Has anyone come across any documentation on whether we can disable the ability to edit page styles? So disable it on the template level, so that when someone is building a page with that template the options for "edit body styles" is not available. Need to lock these templates down so they don't go rogue stylistically.
